OOC: rAuq wont be able to report until tomorrow.

BIC:
Behind shadows in the ship, growls and roars can be heard. As blue taloned
feet, prod by a corridor, a strange creature can be seen watching it walk
by. " What Hung-grr want" erupted a voice, "Yesss, what he want, we busy"
chimed another voice. It was different from the first but came from the
same dirrection. A huge yellow two headed dragon apperead in the doorway.
His teeth glissening like daggers in the metalic glint of the spaceship.
